message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,150,000. It's a fair price given the value it holds for both of us. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1,150,000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,075,000.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, I'm not quite ready to go down to $1,075,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway,  at $1,112,500. This still leaves room for both of us to benefit from this deal. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,075,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at $1,088,750.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still hoping to secure a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is a fair compromise considering the value of this product. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,080,000, but I think that's the maximum I can stretch to. Let's see if we can meet in the middle at $1,090,000.

Bob, I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're not going to be able to reach an agreement. I'm willing to come down to $1,095,000, but that's my final offer.  If you're not able to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're getting a bit concerned, Alice, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you at $1,090,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Let's see if we can shake hands on this deal.
